thread.title: 2017 Porsche 911 S Cabriolet PDK: The Quickest RWD Droptop 911 Ever
thread.title_full: 2017 Porsche 911 S Cabriolet PDK: The Quickest RWD Droptop 911 Ever

author: Steve Siler
title: 2017 Porsche 911 S Cabriolet PDK: The Quickest RWD Droptop 911 Ever
text:
-Well, bless their hearts, as they might say around Porsche’s U.S. headquarters in Atlanta, Georgia. Porsche officially says the 2017 911 Carrera S cabriolet with the PDK automatic transmission and the Sport Chrono package can accelerate from zero to 60 mph in 3.9 seconds. But that number is way off. It takes just 3.2 seconds, according to our measurements. So polite Porsche is, feigning modesty like that. READ MORE ›› 
-
